title: 91/523/EEC: Commission Decision of 18 September 1991 abolishing the support tariffs applied by the Italian railways to the carriage of bulk ores and products produced and processed in Sicily and Sardinia (Only the Italian text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 18 September 1991  abolishing the support tariffs applied by the Italian railways to the carriage of bulk ores and products produced and processed in Sicily and Sardinia  (Only the Italian text is authentic)  (91/523/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Italy shall abolish the system of support tariffs for the carriage of certain types of goods from Sicily and Sardinia introduced by the last paragraph of Article 19 of Law No 887 of 22 December 1984.
This Decision is addressed to the Italian Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 18 September 1991. For the Commission
Karel VAN MIERT
Member of the Commission
(1) Supplement to Gazzetta Ufficiale No 356, 29. 12. 1984.
